Apparently, the place smelled but when I came here it was perfectly normal. Good service too. Enjoyed the place, would recommend.

My Family and I( total of 5 adults, 6 children) went to Flatlands Buffet after my nieces and son graduation. On arrival the restaurant is extremely underwhelming. My family arrived before I did and  being that my family had already paid I gave it a chance. When we sat to the table no one came to take our drink orders and we never received utensils. The food was tasteless and the surrounding environment was disgusting, very poor selection of food, the bathroom was filthy. It smelled when I arrived the entire experience just made my stomach hurt. My family and I had one plate each and rushed out of there. We tried the restaurant because it was close to home, the reviews weren‚Äôt bad and it had 4.0 stars. The place feels like a funeral dead silence and everyone just looking at each other and our eyes are saying why did we pay for this.  Do not waste your time going here for the price you can go to Flaming Grill & Buffet on Flatbush Ave and Tilden Ave next to Old navy and have a way better experience with great food with your family. If I could give negative stars I definitely would.

It was amazing the Birthday experience was amazing and they didn't care about Birthdays before but now they do me and Mom went there for her Birthday and it was fun. Also at K1 the Plates we're dirty and they didn't care but now They really do care about the Service and they give you Cards that are $1 off.

Excellent addition to the neighborhood. The food is delicious and there is an excellent assortment of food to chose.I am in love with the baby bok choy, string beans, brocolli, fish, and chicken. Excellent atmosphere and the staff are polite. Excellent place to pick up a healthy delicious dinner at the end of the day.
